Sentencas: Energy and exergy analyses are used to evaluate the Zero emission coal (ZEC) system.
Titulo: Energy and exergy analyses of a Zero emission coal system

Sentencas: Energy and exergy losses in each unit of the system are calculated and depicted with Sankey diagrams of energy flow and exergy flow when the system operates at a benchmark condition.
Titulo: Energy and exergy analyses of a Zero emission coal system

Sentencas: Sensitivity analysis is carried out to investigate the effects of different operating parameters including H-2 recycling ratio (R-h), calcium to carbon ratio (R-ctc) and fuel utilization factor (U-f) on the energy efficiency (E-en), exergy efficiency (E-ex), total energy efficiency (E-ten), total exergy efficiency (E-tex) and carbon dioxide (CO2) sequestration ratio (R-cs) of this system.
Titulo: Energy and exergy analyses of a Zero emission coal system

Sentencas: The energy loss in the steam turbine (ST) is 35.2% which is the maximum among all the units and the maximum exergy loss of 37.0% occurs in the solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC).
Titulo: Energy and exergy analyses of a Zero emission coal system

Sentencas: R-h at 0.75 and U-f at 0.8 are recommended as the optimum operation parameters of the system based on the sensitivity analysis.
Titulo: Energy and exergy analyses of a Zero emission coal system
Energy and exergy analyses of a Zero emission coal system

Sentencas: R-ctc at 1.5 is recommended to maintain a high CO2 sequestration ratio with acceptable economic penalty.
Titulo: Energy and exergy analyses of a Zero emission coal system

Sentencas: With these optimized parameters, E-en of 36.2%, E-ten of 46.8%, E-ex of 35.7%, E-tex of 46.2% and R-cs of 87.4% can be achieved by the proposed system.
Titulo: Energy and exergy analyses of a Zero emission coal system
Energy and exergy analyses of a Zero emission coal system
Energy and exergy analyses of a Zero emission coal system
